task.title: Adding a page to your project
task.shortdesc: When you add a page to your CWRC project, it is initially added to the CWRC drupal site in general, not only to the project. In order to link it to your project, you must grab the URL of the new page and link it using the Edit project menu(See ____).

step.cmd: Click on the Add a page to project under the Utilities column.
Fill out the Add a page to project form. The title field is required.

p.b: You can choose to preview your new page, click on the Preview button (see screenshot below).

info.p: Once you create a new page in your project, you have to link to it from the project menu. You can do this by copying the URL of the new page and following the steps of Editing/Adding links to the Project Menu.
